analysis.description:
Reclaimable.reclaim (/unique_chucks/12/0xea4df6f41e90dd7b6c482bda228925de159c03f5.sol#895-913) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- reclaimer.transfer(address(this).balance) (/unique_chucks/12/0xea4df6f41e90dd7b6c482bda228925de159c03f5.sol#904-907)

EtherToken.withdraw (/unique_chucks/12/0xea4df6f41e90dd7b6c482bda228925de159c03f5.sol#1733-1735) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(amount) (/unique_chucks/12/0xea4df6f41e90dd7b6c482bda228925de159c03f5.sol#1734)

EtherToken.withdrawAndSend (/unique_chucks/12/0xea4df6f41e90dd7b6c482bda228925de159c03f5.sol#1755-1771) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- sendTo.transfer(amount) (/unique_chucks/12/0xea4df6f41e90dd7b6c482bda228925de159c03f5.sol#1770-1771)
